short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and easy todo extension start page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The quickest way to get things done - add them to your new tab page, and you'll have a reminder whenever you open your browser.


- Type and press enter to add a task
- Check on or off when you finish it
- Right click to delete
